verbose_text: The luciferase reporter assays revealed that luciferase activity driven by the miR-4306 promoter sequence was increased in E2 treated cells but decreased in ER-alpha-silenced cells, whereas knocking down HER2 or PR induced the downregulation of the luciferase activity driven by the miR-4306 promoter sequence.
evidence: luciferase activity driven by the miR-4306 promoter sequence
